name: Riddhima aka Chammak Challo
wishText: I miss you more than anything in this entire world ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to MY adult stinky boi!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are my special baby. Here is Gift #13
outroText: Okay, now text me and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
